data.quote: We rise again in the grass. In the flowers. In songs.
data.author: Anthony Doerr, All the Light We Cannot See

data.quote: Walk the paths of logic. Every outcome has its cause … every predicament has its solution.
data.author: Anthony Doerr, All the Light We Cannot See

data.quote: And once the storm is over, you won’t remember how you made it through, how you managed to survive. You won’t even be sure, whether the storm is really over. But one thing is certain. When you come out of the storm, you won’t be the same person who walked in. That’s what this storm’s all about.
data.author: Haruki Murakami, Kafka on the Shore

data.quote: Courage is the most important of all the virtues because without courage, you can't practice any other virtue consistently.
data.author: Maya Angelou

data.quote: Don't be pushed around by the fears in your mind. Be led by the dreams in your heart.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

data.quote: Instead of worrying about what you cannot control, shift your energy to what you can create.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

data.quote: Take responsibility of your own happiness, never put it in other people’s hands.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

data.quote: Be the reason someone smiles. Be the reason someone feels loved and believes in the goodness in people.
data.author: Roy T. Bennett, The Light in the Heart

data.quote: No matter how much suffering you went through, you never wanted to let go of those memories.
data.author: haruki murakami
